Mona Pirnot. Actress: Last Shift. Mona Pirnot is known for Last Shift (2014), Missing Notes (2011) and Born This Way (2012).
Mona Pirnot is an NYC based playwright and songwriter. She is a current member of EST/Youngblood. Plays include I Love You So Much I Could Die.
